law.catch_line: Each document submitted to the Secretary of State under this title is a public record and shall be:...
law.text:
Each document submitted to the Secretary of State under this title is a public record and shall be:
kept in the Office of the Secretary of State for at least 2 years; and
made available to the public during the normal business hours of the Secretary of State for inspection and for photocopying at a reasonable price.
